metadata.title: CVE-2020-16092 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In QEMU through 5.0.0, an assertion failure can occur in the network packetprocessing. This issue affects the e1000e and vmxnet3 network devices. Amalicious guest user/process could use this flaw to abort the QEMU processon the host, resulting in a denial of service condition innet_tx_pkt_add_raw_fragment in hw/net/net_tx_pkt.c.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
